files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.AnimatedElements.FakeLoadingBar
files.Summary: The is an animated element that simulates a loading bar with a fixed duration.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.AnimatedElements.LoadingBar
files.Summary: The is a passive element that displays a loading bar using a reference to a progress variable.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Attributes.VisualAttribute
files.Summary: The class is used to mark a class, struct, enum, constructor, method, property, field, event, interface, or delegate as a visual and so interact with the console.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Core
files.Summary: The class is a collection of low-level methods responsible of all the interactions between the library and the console (e.g. changing colors, writing text, etc.).

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Enums.BordersType
files.Summary: The enum defines the type of border to use for embed elements.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Enums.DialogOption
files.Summary: The enum defines the outputs of a dialog.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Enums.Direction
files.Summary: The enum defines the direction in some space.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Enums.ElementType
files.Summary: The enum defines the type of an element.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Enums.Font
files.Summary: The enum defines the font used to display styled text. (Used in the element)

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Enums.Placement
files.Summary: The enum defines the placement of a string in some space. It could be another string or a console line.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Enums.PromptInputStyle
files.Summary: The enum defines the style of the prompt input.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Enums.Status
files.Summary: The enum represents the exit status of an interaction.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Enums.TextAlignment
files.Summary: The enum defines the alignment of a string in the space.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Errors.DuplicateElementException
files.Summary: Exception thrown when an element is found twice in a collection.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Errors.ElementNotFoundException
files.Summary: Exception thrown when an element is not found in a collection.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Errors.EmptyFileException
files.Summary: Exception thrown when no data is found in a file.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Errors.LineOutOfConsoleException
files.Summary: Exception thrown when a line exceeds the console's height.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Errors.NotSupportedCharException
files.Summary: Exception thrown when a character is not supported by the TextStyler class.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.InteractiveElements.Dialog
files.Summary: The is an interactive element that displays a dialog bow with one or two choices. See enum for the possible outputs of a dialog.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.InteractiveElements.FloatSelector
files.Summary: The is an interactive element that allows the user to select a float value from a range of values.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.InteractiveElements.IntSelector
files.Summary: The is an interactive element that allows the user to select an integer value from a range of values.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.InteractiveElements.Prompt
files.Summary: The is an interactive element that allows the user to input a string response.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.InteractiveElements.ScrollingMenu
files.Summary: The is an interactive element that displays a question with multiple scrollable choices.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.InteractiveElements.TableSelector
files.Summary: The is an interactive element that displays a table with selectable elements.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Models.AnimatedElement
files.Summary: The class is an abstract class that represents an element that can be rendered on the console and animated.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Models.Borders
files.Summary: The class defines the border characters to use for embed elements.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Models.Element
files.Summary: The class is an abstract class that represents an element that can be rendered on the console.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Models.FontYamlFile
files.Summary: The class defines the structure of a yaml file used to store the height of each character of a font.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Models.InteractionEventArgs<T>
files.Summary: The InteractionEventArgs class is a generic class that represents the event arguments for the interactive elements.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Models.InteractiveElement<TResponse>
files.Summary: The InteractiveElement class is an abstract class that represents the interactive elements.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Models.PassiveElement
files.Summary: The PassiveElement class is an abstract class that represents the passive elements.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Models.Position
files.Summary: The Position struct represents a position in the console with a line and a column.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Models.TextStyler
files.Summary: The class is a class that styles text with the font files.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.PassiveElements.ASCIIArt
files.Summary: The is a passive element that displays ASCII art from a file or string content.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.PassiveElements.Banner
files.Summary: The is a passive element that displays a banner on the console.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.PassiveElements.ElementsDashboard
files.Summary: The is a passive element that displays a dashboard of all the elements currently in the class.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.PassiveElements.ElementsList
files.Summary: The is a passive element that displays a list of all the elements types available.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.PassiveElements.EmbedText
files.Summary: The is a passive element that displays text in a box.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.PassiveElements.Footer
files.Summary: The is a passive element that displays a footer on the console.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.PassiveElements.Header
files.Summary: The is a passive element that displays a header on the console.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.PassiveElements.HeightSpacer
files.Summary: The is a passive element that displays a space between elements with a fixed height.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.PassiveElements.Matrix<T>
files.Summary: The is a passive element that displays a matrix on the console.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.PassiveElements.TableView
files.Summary: The is a passive element that displays a table on the console.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.PassiveElements.Text
files.Summary: The is an passive element that displays one or multiple lines of text.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.PassiveElements.Title
files.Summary: The is a passive element that displays a title on the console.

files.Title: ConsoleAppVisuals.Window
files.Summary: The class is a collection of methods to manage visual elements stored in itself. You may add, remove, or render elements in the console after adding them to the class.
